formatDescription: A graphics format native to Macintosh computers encapsulating the functionality of QuickDraw 1 which supports monochrome bitmaps up to 32k in size.
provenanceCompoundName: Georgia Tech Research Institute / Georgia Tech Research Institute
formatProvenance: 04/2024 (v.118)- Description created and links added as part of PRONOM Research Week 2023. Submitted by Brigham Young University.

internalSignatures.name: Macintosh PICT Image 1.0 v1
internalSignatures.note: 512 byte header beginning with DRWG(MD|D2); At decimal location 522 (hex 20A) 1 byte opcode for “picversion” hex 11; next byte version number hex 01

internalSignatures.name: Macintosh PICT Image 1.0 v2
internalSignatures.note: 512 byte header consisting of all nulls;At decimal location 522 (hex 20A) 1 byte opcode for “picversion” hex 11; next byte version number hex 01
